kyb-verify-subtitle: Get your organization verified to issue credentials.
kyb-failed-subtitle: There was an issue with your application.
kyb-pending-subtitle: We reviewing your submitted documents, we will notify you once it is complete.
kyb-success: Your organization has been successfully verified
kyb-verify-modal-subtitle: Get your organization verified to issue credentials.
kyb-verify-step-1-subtitle: Send a company registration document such as a company certificate/equivalent along with your organization name
kyb-verify-step-2-subtitle: Our verification team will take 1-3 days to process your verification request.
kyb-verify-step-3-subtitle: An email and notification will be sent to you upon successful verification and you will then be able to issue credentials.
kyb-detail-modal-subtitle: Send a company registration document such as a company certificate/equivalent along with your organization name
kyb-success-modal-subtitle: Our verification team will take 1-3 days to process your verification request. An email and notification will be sent to you upon successful verification and you will then be able to issue credentials.
kyb-pending-modal-subtitle: An email and notification will be sent to you upon successful verification and you will then be able to issue credentials.
kyb-rejected-modal-title: There was an issue with your application
kyb-rejected-modal-subtitle: Our team will be contact with you by email. If your request is urgent please contact us directly at info@socious.io.
